extDesc.message: Automagically uncheck the 'Stay signed in' checkbox on the Google Accounts page.

popupDesc.message: This extension watches for the Google Account Sign On page and automatically unchecks the "Stay signed in" checkbox.
popupDesc.description: The description in the popup box.

popupTagline.message: We think you're really sweet Google. We're just not ready for that kind of commitment.
popupTagline.description: The fun little tagline in the popup box

hoverTitle.message: Google Account Sign In page detected!
hoverTitle.description: Set the message the appears when the omnibox icon is hovered over
